description: The aim of this course is to develop students’ listening and speaking skills needed in a wide range of social and cultural situations. Relevant grammar, culture issues and vocabulary will be covered in the course so as to prepare students to express their opinions effectively in English in different social and academic contexts.

syllabus.zh:
學生將依照以下情境進行英語聽講訓練:
1.全球問候禮儀
2.亞洲節慶
3.柬埔寨的塗鴉文化
4.家事
5.亞洲藝術節慶
6.世界旅遊
7.國際食物與餐桌禮儀
8.健康與健身
9.時尚與服裝
10.電腦科技與發明
11.電影
12.友誼
syllabus.en:
Students will develop listening and speaking ability in English in the following contexts:
1.Greetings around the world
2.Interesting festivals in Asia
3.Ancient graffiti discovered in Cambodia
4.Housework
5.The Asia Art Festival
6.Travel
7.International food and table manners
8.Health and Fitness
9.Fashion and Clothing
10.Computer Technology
11.Movies
12.Friendship

teachingAndAssessment.objective: To be able to appreciate the culture of different countries
To be able to speak sensibly and listen carefully in group discussions
To be able to convey messages concisely and clearly
To develop confidence in public speaking.
To be able to communicate in English effectively
To be able to research on a topic and think critically
